entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • There is a difference in the Regex judgment results. #94156
  • .NET 8, missing StartsWithAny and EndsWithAny methods in MemoryExtensions #94155
  • .NET 8, Windows x64 regression: Random (GC-related?) AVs in code constructing a large object graph from XML #94154
  • [API Proposal]: Enhance Single, SingleOrDefault, First, and Last to allow throwing a custom exception. #94153
  • Client Certificate Validation in .NET core is too restrictive #94152
  • PInvoke Source generation stops after first method with `global using` #94150
  • Linux Kernel Regression on tcp socket disconnection track issue #94149
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Non-nullable reference types support #7988
    Future
  • Implement Efficient EventPipeBuffer Reading in Managed Code #10621
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-use status flag inside Ping #94151
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix test returning 100 unconditionally #94146
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 118.0.5993.117, windows: 119.0.6045.59 #94144
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Disabling two socket tests #93916
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098 #94100
    area-Meta
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • LSRA: PreferCalleeSave for non-localVar intervals #92744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • OutputType does not set Nt headers correctly on Linux #3990
  • ApplicationIcon does not work when cross building win-x64 from Linux #3943
  • Question: why not add `IsTestProject` to project property when create a test project? #3790
  • Build error NETSDK1124 with NET8 RC2 when multiple TargetFrameworks #36540
  • .NET local tool install not working with .NET 8 RC2 SDK #36539

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #36543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expression loophole: ability to invoke .Add() method with the parameter type not matching the collection expression element type #70617

Closed

  • visual studio 2022 code search not working #67297
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Performance] Reduce the work done by remove unreachable analyzer when calculating diagnostics #70455
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM (8.0 RC) does not work on iOS 15.8 #51736
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formaction attribute #51734

Closed

  • Provide a loadBootResource code example working with Brotoli and taking into account correctly the environment! #51552
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter #51724
  • [BUG] NullReferenceException when using multiple authentication schemes #51561
  • Perf improvement: mvc #51711
  • Perf regression: fortunes #51730

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use ArgumentNullException instead null coalescing #51732
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grouped CollectionView in NavigationPage on iOS recreates the grouped header view on every scroll event #18421
  • [Windows]ViewExtensions RotateYTo and RotateXTo with length 0 crashes on Windows #18420
  • NSUnknownKeyException on BlazorHybrid MauiApp template #18419
  • [Android] ScrollView Orientation=Neither not working #18418
  • GraphicsView Interactions and Gestures stop working when used together on Android #18417
  • [Android] Draw() not called if GraphicsView is child of a ScrollView with Orientation different from Vertical #18416

Closed

  • Text Color for Button, Picker, CheckBox cannot be changed on Windows, iOS, MacCatalyst #18393

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Android] Fix Border clipping issues #18134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, s/pr-needs-author-input
